Change Madhab

Though the practice of switching madhab is rare, some have done it in the past for various reasons - practicality, wisdom, or even being inspired by the teachings of a particular Sunni imam and his school of thought. Perhaps one of the other madhabs may serve you better...
I will follow the school of Abu Hanifa
I will follow the school of Malik ibn Anas
I will follow the school of Muhhamad Al-Shafi'i
